ygData.subject: Re: Karana
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey I don t see why you have such a problem with Veeshan I play on there and have for a while. But last nite I did create a Wood Elf Druid on Brell so if you
ygData.messageBody:
Hey I don't see why you have such a problem with Veeshan I play on there and
have for a while. But last nite I did create a Wood Elf Druid on Brell so if
you see Tinarin give him a holler..


>From: Vatigerboy <vatigerboy@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
>To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Karana
>Date: Tue, 10 Aug 1999 10:34:56 -0400
>
>From: Vatigerboy <vatigerboy@...>
>
>How are yall's (sorry for the slang, Im from VA and it early here) server's
>people
>wise. Im on Veeshan and it is horrid. Alot are rude, prices are outragous
>(800p
>for a FBR). I hate leaving all my loot behind, but if I can find a good
>server with
>good folks I might. Oh, and I still play on Brell, just still a little to
>crowded
>in the newbie areas.
>
>Tiger
>
>sonderac@... wrote:
>
> > From: sonderac@...
> >
> > Hello!
> >
> > There is actually someone else on the Karana server!! I'm scared, I
>only play
> > one character, am also an officer in the Combine and am level 22, OH,
>but wait,
> > I have not met any gay people on Karana and I'm a Wizard. Ok, so this
>isn't
> > one of my alternate personalities playing with my head. : ) Hopefully
>I'll
> > Korwin around sometime, and the rest of you all need to move to the only
>true
> > server - Karana! : ) Hope everyone is doing well!
> >
> > Scotty
> > Sonderac
> > High Elf Wizard
> > 22 Level - Karana Server
> >
> > Quoting Rich Hletko <moonbear@...>:
> >
> > > From: "Rich Hletko" <moonbear@...>
> > >
> > > Hi again.
> > >
> > > I love the idea of the Mystic Alliance. Unfortunately...I am one of
>those
> > > people who plays just one character. On top of that I'm an officer in
> > > Light
> > > of Norrath on the Karana server. As such I don't see myself bailing
>out of
> > > the guild I'm in right at the moment. I've only bumped into a couple
>of
> > > gay
> > > folks on Karana...and those I know in RL.
> > >
> > > If enough people get together and want to form the guild on
>Karana..let me
> > > know. I'd be willing to switch at that time.
> > >
> > > Korwin Delamber (currently 22nd lvl magician)
> > >
